posts.post_content:
Hi all,

I'm looking for T216 cards (all backs, all conditions, raw & graded).

Buying and trading (have T216 to trade as well other sets).

Email only, no PMs.

Cheers,
Steve

Steve,

Not sure if you saw this one or if you might already have it.

[url]http://www.brockelmanauctions.com/T216_Kotton_Cigarettes_Chief_Bender_Baltimore_Feds-LOT12839.aspx[/url]

Scott
Thanks, Scott -- I do have that one.  Good luck with the auction!

September bump with a reward addition.

If you lead me to a private transaction for a T216 I need, I'll provide a $100 reward per card.  (No auctions, public listings, etc)

If it's your card, we'll settle on a trade or price, and then I'll kick in the extra bucks.

No want list available, as I have many cards that I'd upgrade if the opportunity presents itself.

Email only please.

Thanks all!
Well, I guess I am going to have to start looking for a t216 collection...

Tried sending you a PM, but your box is full. 

I have a Hal Chase t216 Fielding, Buffalo, Kotton People's fact 4, in SGC 30/2. Let me know if you need it and I can send pics and discuss a trade or sale. 

Thanks 
Brian

Hi Brian,

Thanks for the note.  I've switched to using email only.

I'm fortunate to have a nice copy of the Buffalo Fielding, but thank you for contacting me!

Cheers,
Steve

Is the Chase still available?

Mike

Sent from my SM-G950U using Tapatalk

Mailbox is full

I have a psa graded 1, Dooin Cincinnati Mino back.  It looks great for a 1 btw.  Let me me know what you think.  
Cory

Post-National, Pre-REA bump.  Email only please.

(Cory, I'm pretty sure I emailed you, but I have both Dooins, thank you!)
I have a Bender Mino if interested.  Just let me know.
And a Marquard Kotton that's currently for sale on the board.

Hey Dave, 

Thank you for the response!  I'm fortunate to have both of those cards already, but the look is much appreciated.

Cheers,
Steve

Bumping with a funny picture.  Still looking for T216!

Also, a belated thank you to Dan for the VE Evers.
